original_text: In this way the priest will make atonement for them before the Lord, and they will be forgiven for any of the things they did that made them guilty.”
korean_text: 제사장은 여호와 앞에서 그를 위하여 속죄한즉 그는 무슨 허물이든지 사함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: In this way the priest will make atonement for them
sentences.korean_translation: 이렇게 제사장은 그들을 위하여 속죄할 것이며

sentences.original_text: for any of the things they did
